questions.question: Calculate number of 1s in a binary number(num)
options: num.split('0').length
num.split('1').length
(num % 10).length

questions.question: How to shift array elements to right in javascript
options: arr.concat(arr.splice(0,1))
arr.unshift.apply(arr, arr.splice(arr.length-1,1))
arr.push.apply(arr, arr.splice(0,1))
arr.concat(arr, arr.splice(arr.length-1,1))

It is a react life cycle method

questions.question: What does side effects mean in react

A function is said to have side effect if it trys to modify anything outside its body
Side effect is a lifecycle method in Reactjs
